Description: A unique identifier assigned to each participant in the study.
The day number relative to the start of the study (e.g., Day 1, Day 2).
The total number of app sessions recorded on the given day.
The calendar date on which the app sessions occurred (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
A sequential identifier for each app session on the given day for the participant.
The name of the app used during the session.
The time of day when the app session began (format: HH:MM:SS).
The duration of the app session in minutes.
The category of the app used during the session (e.g., Social, Productivity, Entertainment).
